WorkItem.Description:
Just started using Rawr since way back in early Wrath. Imported my character using the addon (which is super awesome, by the way) and went to optimize and found the Fractured Chimera's Eye was not available.
 
Not sure if this is the case with other JC-only Gems, but thought it worth mentioning.
 
Was using Prot Warrior config.
WorkItem.Summary: [ProtWarr] Fractured Chimera's Eye (& other JC-Only Gems?) unavailable

Comments.Message: Did you enable the JC gemming templates?

Ah, I see. Yes, done that now. 

I guess I just presumed it would pick up that I'm a JC and would automatically default to that.

Thanks for the help.
